name: Guardian of the Sand
description:
The art of fine sand castle building is often overlooked, but not by one brave beachgoer. Even at such a young age he is a master of the craft: Every tower, every rampart--Perfection. 

There’s only one problem…

Our little builder forgot to create his latest masterpiece outside of the high tide line!

The sea is sweeping in! Defend the castle for as long as you can!

Use your giant sand pile to fill your bucket and build sand breaks. They’ll slow the tide and reduce the damage dealt to your castle. But be careful! Just like the castle, sand breaks will ultimately succumb to the sea. Keep building breaks, and whenever possible, take a bucket of sand to repair your castle!

Oh…and watch out for crabs!

Move: W, A, S,D

Dig sand from pile: left mouse button at giant sand pile

Create sand break: left mouse button when bucket is full

Repair sand castle: left mouse button next to castle when bucket is full

Created for LD50:  Delay the inevitable
